item.title: CTF - flaws2.cloud Attacker Level 1
item.description: Abstract In the <flaws2.cloud> Capture The FLag (CTF) attacker level 1 challenge, participants must bypass a 100 digit PIN requirement to progress. This document is a report of a an attempt to solve the mentioned CTF level. It provides an overview of the methods and steps taken to achieve the solution. Status of This Memo This document is published for informational purposes. It serves as a recorded reference for the author’s attempt, helping to retain the steps taken.
